title: Sampo plc’s share buybacks 22 August 2025
description: Sampo plc, stock exchange release, 25 August 2025 at 8:30 am EEST Sampo plc’s share buybacks 22 August 2025 On 22 August 2025, Sampo plc (business code 0142213-3, LEI 743700UF3RL386WIDA22) has acquired its own A shares (ISIN code FI4000552500) as follows: Sampo plc’s share buybacksAggregated daily volume (in number of shares)Daily weighted average price of the purchased shares*Market (MIC Code) 2,6089.92AQEU 117,6099.91CEUX 29,0139.91TQEX 176,3509.91XHELTOTAL325,5809.91 * rounded to two decimals
content:
On 22 August 2025, Sampo plc (business code 0142213-3, LEI 743700UF3RL386WIDA22) has acquired its own A shares (ISIN code FI4000552500) as follows:

On 6 August 2025, Sampo announced a share buyback programme of up to a maximum of EUR 200 million in compliance with the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) 596/2014 (MAR) and the Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/1052. The programme, which started on 7 August 2025, is based on the authorisation granted by Sampo's Annual General Meeting on 23 April 2025.

After the disclosed transactions, the company owns in total 3,924,056 Sampo A shares representing 0.15 per cent of the total number of shares in Sampo plc.

Details of each transaction are included as an appendix of this announcement.



 For further information, please contact:
summary: On 22 August 2025, Sampo plc has acquired its own A shares, representing 0.15% of the total number of shares purchased by the company. This move is in compliance with the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) 596/2014 (MAR) and the Commission Delegated Regulation (EC) 2016/1052. The company owns in total 3,924,056 Sampo A shares.
shortSummary: Sapothen's Sampo plc has acquired 3,924,056 Sampo A shares in a share buyback program up to EUR 200 million, following a series of transactions announced in August 2015.
